name: The Dark Truth Of P.S. 38 Part 3
name_original: The Dark Truth Of P.S. 38 Part 3
description:
The Dark Truth Of P.S. 38 Part 3 is a game developed by multiplegamesman. It was originally released in 2021.
The Dark Truth Of P.S. 38 Part 3 is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. The game is sold via itch.io.
